column4: Hi, Quick question I have a laptop running ubuntu its a bit laggy with only 512mb I was wondering if I purchased 1gb more would I see a decent increase in speed? Also my laptop currently is using 533mhz the extra ram is 667mhz which is compatable with my laptop will these two be compatible with each other?
for best performance and to reduce "problems" you should match type and speed of ram
that was my initial thought but the shop is out of stock.
then get 2.. of the same type that's available and sell the old one..
